RT @MuhammadLila: Toronto just proved how rare it stands in North America, and even the world.
No shots fired. No mass panic. Suspect pe…
#Toronto is a beautiful place to call home, and nothing anyone says or does will change that—not a racist on the internet, and not a madman using a van as a weapon.

City streets are packed with people out for runs, on their way to the Leafs game, or walking their dogs. Friends are meeting for drinks. Parents are taking their kids to the park. On one of the most shocking and painful days in its history, this city is full of life.
If you're like me and the ill-informed, anonymous internet tweeting whack nonsense about the #TorontoAttack has got you thinking, "fuck, I hate people," then just step outside.
